Sentencas: In the context of developing a full scope numerical simulation of microwave sintering, a more precise and fundamentally based method of calculating the electromagnetic field strengths was sought.
Titulo: Calculation of the electromagnetic field in a multimode microwave cavity for sintering planar-perovskite SOFC ceramics

Sentencas: The finite difference time domain (FDTD) method was adopted and implemented for this purpose.
Titulo: Calculation of the electromagnetic field in a multimode microwave cavity for sintering planar-perovskite SOFC ceramics

Sentencas: The temporal nature of the electromagnetic fields was studied to ensure stable algorithms for determining root mean square values for field strengths.
Titulo: Calculation of the electromagnetic field in a multimode microwave cavity for sintering planar-perovskite SOFC ceramics

Sentencas: Further, a method was outlined whereby the multimode nature of a cavity can be determined with quality parameters for the source frequency.
Titulo: Calculation of the electromagnetic field in a multimode microwave cavity for sintering planar-perovskite SOFC ceramics

Sentencas: A example calculation is given for lanthanum nickelate, a potential solid oxide fuel cell cathode material with a complex microwave response, arising from its significant dielectric and magnetic loss properties.
Titulo: Calculation of the electromagnetic field in a multimode microwave cavity for sintering planar-perovskite SOFC ceramics
